rules_text:
Lifelink
[i]Raid[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, create two 1/1 white and black Cleric creature tokens.
rules_text2:
Piercing
Exile target permanent, Sunmade Finality deals 3 damage to its controller.
[i]Metalcraft[/i] – As long as you control three or more artifacts, you gain life equal to the mana value of the exiled permanent.
